highlights: Developed internal company tooling saving hours per week per employee.
Streamlined all hardware lifecycles for a better managed, cost effective, IT strategy.
Cut inefficiencies in current IT operations that saved the company tens of thousands of dollars.
Supported the Surface Training Advanced Virtual Environment Combat Systems (STAVE-CS) Virtual Maintenance Trainer (VMT) projects, a collection of Unity-based virtual world maintenance trainers.

Designed and developed the Operational Readiness Test System (ORTS) for the STAVE-CS VMT projects.  Leveraged real-world big data to dynamically construct a virtual ORTS instance based on the appropriate STAVE-CS VMT project.
Led a small team of developers and managed a business relationship with Lockheed Martin engineers to assist with the development of ORTS for the STAVE-CS VMT projects.
Key developer for an internal group of assemblies that increased the overall stability and development speed across all STAVE-CS VMT projects.
Designed, developed, and deployed the companyâ€™s website.
Developed internal form system and API to improve day-to-day operations for field and office employees.
Improved overall satisfaction for customers and employees, leading to an increase in revenue and operational efficiency.
Re-designed and developed their current website leading to an increase in customer acquisition.
Optimized performance of the overall website - vastly improving load times.

projects.description: A React component library built for Vercel, designed by Clutchd.

awards.summary: Recognized for earning a GPA of at least 3.5 in a term while completing at least 6 credits and maintained a cumulative GPA of 3.5 or higher.
